formatted_address: 2 Emerald Hill Rd, Peranakan Place, Singapore 229287
name: Alleybar

reviews.text: Celebrated a friend’s 60th Birthday at Alley Bar on ladies’ night! Love the vibes and atmosphere. We had great fun, food and companions. The servers Haekal & Layla were awesome. Haekal knew the menu inside out and was able to recommend great food choices to us. Birthday lady also received a complimentary Bailey chocolate cocktail as a surprise!

it was my first time eating at alleybar and it did not disappoint! shoutout to laila, eunice and mimie for being so welcoming and friendly towards us:) since we were celebrating my birthday, they gave us complimentary drinks that tasted so good. the food was absolutely delicious as well. would definitely recommend others to eat here during special occasions.

Alleybar, tucked away in Peranakan Place, offers a unique, cozy atmosphere. This bar highlight its blend of old-world charm and modern style. Expect well-crafted cocktails and a relaxed vibe. Some note that it can be a bit pricey, but if you get the promotion, it is a good deal. overall experience is generally considered worth it. It's a great spot for a relaxed evening.

It’s been a while since I’ve been here but I found myself at Alleybar on a Wednesday evening. Two happy hour Bellinis and a prawn pie tee (not bad at all - try it!) later, I’m a happier bunny than I was when I walked in.

Haykal’s and Matthew’s customers service were top-notch so as the others service team members at Alley Bar.  Everybody were superbly awesome, friendly and attentive.  Everyone consistently provides their outstanding service and make us feel welcomed every time we visit.

I highly recommended the place - very relaxing where you can enjoy food and drinks with group of friends and/or love ones.  A MUST visit bar in Singapore!
